This is a module which behaves like an accordian. Clicking on the button will expand or collapse the pane below it
To use this component do the following

### Drawer with primary button and the collapse pane closed
```jsx
<div>
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000
            }
        } 
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'primary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'end'}
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Home</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Milky Way Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop red purse</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
</div>
```

### Drawer disabled
```jsx
<div>
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000
            }
        } 
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'primary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'end'}
        disabled
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Home</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Milky Way Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop red purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
</div>
```

### Drawer with alternate styled button and the collapse pane opened
```jsx
<div>
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000,
                isOpen: true
            }
        } 
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'secondary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'end'}
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Home</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Milky Way Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop red purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
</div>
```

### Drawer with glyph at the start and text at the end
```jsx
<div>
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000
            }
        }
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'primary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'start'}
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Home</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Milky Way Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop red purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
</div>
```

### Drawer with secondary button and the collapse pane opened which is controlled by it's parent's props
```jsx
const DrawerExample = require('./Drawer.examples').default;
<div>
    <DrawerExample
        collapseProps = {
            {
                    className: 'drawer',
                    timeout: 1000,
                    isOpen: true
            }
        }
        initState = {false}
    />
</div>
```
### SASS variables

```scss { "sassVariablesFile": "../scss/_variables.scss"}
```

### All Examples
```jsx noeditor
const DrawerExample = require('./Drawer.examples').default;

<div className="vvt-drawer">
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000
            }
        } 
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'primary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'end'}
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Home</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Milky Way Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop red purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
  <br />
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000
            }
        } 
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'primary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'end'}
        disabled
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Home</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Milky Way Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop red purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
 <br />
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000,
                isOpen: true
            }
        } 
        toggleButtonText={'Select Shipping Address'}
        toggleButtonProps={
            {
                color:'secondary',
                tag:'button'
            }
        }
        openGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-up'}
        closeGlyph={'fa fa-chevron-down'}
        glyphPlacement={'end'}
    >
        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />

            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
  <br />
    <Drawer
        collapseProps={
            {
                className: 'drawer',
                timeout: 1000
            }
        }

            {
                color:'primary',

            }
        }

        <div className='card drawer__card'>
            <CardDeck>

                    </CardBody>
                </Card>

                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />
                    <CardBody>
                        <CardTitle>Work</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Andromeda Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in outerspace</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop orange purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
                <Card>
                    <CardImg top width="100%" src="https://img-prod-cms-mr-microsoft-com.akamaized.net/cms/api/fabrikam/imageFileData/MA1VFr?ver=cdf2" alt="Card image cap" />

                        <CardTitle>Store Pickup</CardTitle>
                        <CardSubtitle>Pinwheel Galaxy</CardSubtitle>
                        <CardText>Somewhere in Ursula Major.</CardText>
                        <Button color={'primary'}>Shop pink purses</Button>
                    </CardBody>
                </Card>
            </CardDeck>
        </div>
    </Drawer>
  <br />
   <DrawerExample
        collapseProps = {
            {
                    className: 'drawer',
                    timeout: 1000,
                    isOpen: true
            }
        }
        initState = {false}
    />
</div>
```
